Paragraph: 49-51 However , it was interesting to notice that PIDT-C12NT , which has four thiophenes in each repeat unit , presented a simultaneous bathochromic shift of short wavelength absorption peak to 465 nm and hypsochromic shift of the long wavelength absorption peak to 593 nm along with increased relative intensity of the high and low - energy peaks.
